entry.title: The Letters of Being Loved
entry.summary:
Author: mossmp3

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,721Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: "Dear Bobby, I know what you’re going to say. That this letter is meant for a loved one, or someone important. I know that writing this letter for your captain is unusual, and simply unnerving. I have no one else to write this to, so you were my choice." - Buck finds out that everyone at the 118 has letters for their loved ones in the chance that they end up being one of the one in fifteen thousand firefighters that die on the job. It takes him a while to figure out the true purpose of it, however.

entry.title: Strange (But Not a Stranger)
entry.summary:
Author: silk_knickers

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,005Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 17

Summary: There was a scar on the back of New Guy's neck. Buck noticed it for the first time when Edmundo was kneeling over the well-inflated mechanic, preparing to vent his pleural cavity. The scar was old and fully healed, a horizontal pale line of slightly thicker skin precisely one and a half inches long, just below the hairline and right over the gap between the C4 and C5 vertebrae. Buck had seen scars like this one before. Though still somewhat rare, everyone knew they were characteristic of stack implantation surgery on an adult. ~~~~~Or:Buck wonders why the new guy is being so weird around him.Eddie wonders if he's being punished by the universe.Bobby wonders if he made a mistake bringing these two together.A few years after spending two weeks walking around in a borrowed sleeve, Eddie meets the absolute last person he ever thought he would meet.

entry.title: Westbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,036Chapters: 16/18Kudos: 24

Summary: Right after the season 8 finale, Buck leaves Los Angeles for Santa Monica. Choosing a new home, new friends, and finally, himself. Eddie doesn’t understand why Buck pulled away, and the silence drives him to the edge. But feelings don’t disappear with distance, and eventually, Eddie has to face what he's been avoiding all along. What follows is his clumsy, heartfelt attempt to win Buck back.or...Buck accepts his feelings and moves away, leaving Eddie confused and realizing what he’s lost. Now, Eddie must find a way to win Buck back.

entry.title: take it or leave it
entry.summary:
Author: stardozen

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,226Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 289

Summary: "You're not a gay guy. Is it that hard to make your partners cum?" He asks, finding himself finally including an equally drunk Eddie in his ramblings. Eddie seems to falter, finally glancing over at Buck. The TV's still on, except this time neither of them knows what's on. They're in their own little world. "Never been a problem for me," The other man replies, rubbing over his upper lip like he's done all night, reminding himself that his (not so) beloved mustache is gone. "But Tommy's used to dicks. I'm not." ORa rewrite of s8 e6 where instead of ending the episode eddie + buck have sex and chaos ensues

entry.title: The Kendall Calendar
entry.summary:
Author: Jvp1t3rthyf4g

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,418Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Maddie's eyes widen as she sees a face shes tried so hard to forget. Even worse is the fact that her boyfriend is just casually chatting with him, as if he hadn't helped her through panic attacks because of him."Mads, you okay?" Her brother's voice echoes through her head."Please tell me I'm not hallucinating, Buck." She whispers so quiet, Buck almost doesn't hear her. she points at the man. The husband she had left, escaped, just chatting with her new partner."Is that... Doug?"

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,454Chapters: 9/23Kudos: 225

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: Never Let Me Go ( A Sinner Like Me)
entry.summary:
Author: colescharms

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 168,918Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 297

Summary: When infamous rockstar Evan “Buck” Buckley gets injured (again), his label hires Army vet-turned-EMT Eddie Diaz to shadow him on tour. Eddie’s job is simple: keep Buck breathing. But nothing about Buck is simple—not his smile, not his secrets, and definitely not the way he starts to feel like home.Eddie’s supposed to keep Buck safe. Buck’s supposed to stay out of trouble. But somewhere between motel parking lots, midnight emergency calls, and songs that sound too much like confessions, lines blur—and hearts get caught in the wreckage.This tour might save Buck’s career. It might ruin Eddie’s life. Or maybe, if they’re lucky, it could be the start of something louder than either of them expected.

entry.title: No Promises
entry.summary:
Author: sherlockedblogger20

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,465Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 70

Summary: “You’re cooking?” Eddie asks, amused.Buck glances over his shoulder with a grin. “Yeah, well. You keep feeding me freezer-burned waffles and coffee that tastes like despair. I’m staging an intervention.”Eddie chuckles. “I didn’t realize my breakfast habits were such a public health crisis.”“They’re a tragedy, Diaz.”There’s a pause, a quiet moment stretched thin between laughter and something heavier.“You’re kind of amazing,” Eddie says softly.Buck stops, knife hovering mid-air. He looks up. “You’re just now figuring that out?”Eddie’s smile is small and steady. “No. Just... reminding myself.”

Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,173Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 129

Summary: Eddie Diaz is a renowned professional fighter, celebrated for his power in the ring, and a devoted single father to his son Christopher, who brings immense joy to his life. However, Eddie has a deep-seated dislike for the idea of soulmates and predetermined relationships.On the other hand, Evan Buckley, a brave firefighter, has always held onto the hope of finding his soulmate, and his dreams have been filled with visions of their perfect encounter. So, when he finally meets Eddie on a normal Tuesday call, he is happy, excited, overjoyed, only to discover that his soulmate hates the idea of soulmates and is straight!?Will they be able to overcome their differences and find a deeper connection?———OREddie Diaz, a professional fighter and single father, Evan Buckley a firefighter, Happened to be soulmates! They are meant for each other, right? One problem though will maybe two Eddie Diaz hates Soulmates and is also Straight!?

entry.title: rookie mistake
entry.summary:
Author: zanekeller

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,704Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 281

Summary: “Look, I get it,” Buck said, leaning against the lockers like they were at a bar. “You’re the strong, silent, brooding type. You’ve been here longer. You think I’m some punk with a death wish—” Eddie turned, slow and deliberate. “You think this is about me not liking you?” Buck blinked, thrown. “Isn’t it?” “No. This is about you thinking you know better than a team that’s been doing this longer than you’ve been legally allowed to drink.” or, season 1 Buck meets season 8 Eddie, and everything repressed has to come out eventually.
